key.name: folder-list
key.description: A list of folder paths, each containing images that will be used as wallpapers

key.name: change-time
key.summary: How often are the wallpapers changed (in minutes)
key.description: Set how often are the wallpapers changed (min 0 min. max 3000 min)

key.name: change-mode
key.description: Decide how you want your wallpapers changed. Values are "different" for changing desktop and lockscreen randomly, "same" changes destkop and lockscreen using the same image on both, "desktop" for changing only desktop wallpaper and "lockscreen" for chaging only the lockscreen wallpaper.
